body_html: Yeah, as @gunan pointed out, our devel docker images (especially the GPU one) used to be so large that they caused download and disk space issues to users, so we removed the bazel cache, which reduced the image size by about 50%.
body_text: Yeah, as @gunan pointed out, our devel docker images (especially the GPU one) used to be so large that they caused download and disk space issues to users, so we removed the bazel cache, which reduced the image size by about 50%.
body: Yeah, as @gunan pointed out, our devel docker images (especially the GPU one) used to be so large that they caused download and disk space issues to users, so we removed the bazel cache, which reduced the image size by about 50%.
